Products.ProductFeatures:
If you like to show off even while you cover up, the UV Skinz womenâ€™s long board shorts are for you. These semi-fitted, mid-rise shorts give you a flattering fit and look while the extra length and high-quality material provide the coverage you need to confidently enjoy your favorite summertime activities. These ladiesâ€™ board shorts are top-notch for protecting your backside on or off the beach, providing ultimate comfort and freedom of movement along the way.

These womenâ€™s board shorts are made of quick-drying, UPF 50+, stretch woven fabric that flexes with you, so you stay at the top of your game no matter the activity. Wear them for surfing, paddle boarding, poolside romping or yoga on the beach. You can even throw them on for a quick trek to the farmerâ€™s market or gym. A snap and zipper fly closure keeps the shorts securely in place while an anti-chlorine treatment and saltwater resistance prevents damage or fading from possible splashes.

These UV Skinz womenâ€™s board shorts come in three different colors featuring a tropical shell pattern, ensuring they match style with functionality and ease. Get a pair (or three!) today.
